committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A Bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to provide for the pricing of Federal Reserve System services and for the payment of interest on reserves.

summary.text: Federal Reserve Membership Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to direct the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to prepare and publish a schedule of fees for its services and a set of pricing principles no later than July 1, 1979, and to put a fee schedule into effect no later than July 1, 1980. Directs the Board to pay interest on those reserves which member banks are required to maintain at a rate not in excess of the rate paid on United States Treasury bills with maturities of three months. Requires that the Board prepare a study on the feasibility and impact of permitting member banks to invest a percentage of their required reserves in United States Treasury securities.

titles.title: A Bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to provide for the pricing of Federal Reserve System services and for the payment of interest on reserves.
